name: unselfconsciousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that shows you are not worried about other people's opinions of you, about doing things in a particular way, or about being impressive: Singing requires confidence and unselfconsciousness. The performers' deft timing, unself-consciousness, and individuality make the performance a resounding success. He has a laid-back un-self-consciousness that comes from growing up the way he did. Opposite
self-consciousnessRelated words
unselfconscious
unselfconsciously
More examplesFewer examplesSuch spirit and unselfconsciousness cannot be faked.They worshipped in absolute unselfconsciousness.He had a natural unselfconsciousness.Her self-consciousness on the stage is at odds with the unselfconsciousness of her screen performances.
